text:
EXCEPTIONAL EXPERIENCES UNFORGETTABLE EVENTSLET'S GET STARTED!
Contact Us Services
;
CREATING AN EXCEPTIONAL EXPERIENCE, EVERY TIME
CSI DMC is the destination management company clients trust to create exceptional experiences. We transform events into unforgettable memories for organizations worldwide. Driven by a team of talented designers, destination experts, and event management professionals, we support our clients’ success with boundless creativity, deep destination knowledge, extensive local relationships, global resources, and proven logistical expertise. Some of our services are below. Where may we create your next exceptional experience?
elevated special events
CUSTOM culinary experiences
DESTINATION tours & activities
Teambuilding & CSR
premier Transportation
Meeting Management
hybrid PROGRAMS

title: Custom International Destination Event Planning & Management | CSI DMC
text:
International
Exceptional knows no boundaries with CSI DMC. Your trusted source for all Destination and Event Management services has gone global to create Exceptional Experiences, Every Time, Anywhere…
Argentina Australia Belize Brazil British Virgin Islands Cambodia Cayman Islands Chile China Colombia Costa Rica
Croatia Czech Republic Dominican Republic England France Guatemala Germany Greece Honduras Hong Kong Iceland
India Indonesia Ireland Italy Japan Kenya Malaysia Mexico Monaco Montenegro Nevis
New Zealand Nicaragua Panama Poland Portugal Russia Scotland Singapore South Africa Slovenia Spain
Switzerland Tanzania Thailand Turkey UAE Vietnam & more!
Lynda Baum
Lynda Baum +1 408-234-7518 lynda.baum@csi-dmc.com
International
Planning events overseas can be daunting – different languages, currencies, regulations. CSI DMC is the solution to your global program needs. With the same service-driven approach, our international experts provide a high level of expertise, creativity, and value that is consistent across our entire company. We have the knowledge and connections to successfully deliver exceptional experiences around the world, instilling the confidence and security of a trusted partner in our clients.  Where to next?

text:
Nationwide
Tom Hubler
Chief Operating Officer +1 312-927-6265 tom.hubler@csi-dmc.com
NATIONWIDE
CSI DMC produces elevated events in over 65 destinations every year. Our team of destination experts, creative designers and event management professionals provide the trusted solution for clients seeking professional, innovative and consistent destination and event management expertise across the country and around the world. Our extensive local relationships, national contacts and global reach are built upon a foundation of 36 years of excellence. CSI DMC is the strategic Destination Management Company and quality partner of choice for wherever your next program may take you. Where may we create your next exceptional experience?

title: Custom Destination Event Planning & Management - Washington D.C. | CSI DMC
text:
Washington DC
Annette Hawks
Senior VP, Global Sales +1 407-615-1111 annette.hawks@csi-dmc.com
CSI DMC Washington DC
Traditional with a twist, Washington, DC is a must-see international city! The capital of the United States is home to hundreds of museums and monuments, embassies and cultural centers, James Beard & Michelin starred restaurants, over forty live performance theaters, and much more. Guests come for the history and politics, stay for the culture and culinary delights, and return for the abundance of dynamic experiences that go beyond the district borders and into the rolling hills of Virginia and the seascapes of Chesapeake-area Maryland. CSI DMC Washington, DC provides clients exciting experiences for both the first-time visitor and even the most seasoned of travelers.

The CSI DMC Texas team offers detailed local knowledge of the Dallas, Austin, San Antonio, and Houston areas, providing you and your guests with on the ground support and the latest insights into the incredible offerings of the Lone Star State. Whether your program is small or large, with CSI DMC Texas, it will be impactful in a BIG Texas way!

title: Custom Destination Event Planning & Management - Miami South FL | CSI DMC
text:
South Florida
Brian Whitt
Senior Vice President Global Sales +1 305-433-1027 brian.whitt@csi-dmc.com
CSI DMC Florida
There’s so much more than sunshine to be found in this state! South Florida includes top international destinations like Miami and The Keys, as well as neighborhoods revered for art, shopping, and beautiful beaches. From Palm Beach to Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood, Naples and Marco Island, guests can unlock the region’s local secrets with our insider knowledge. Discover treasures such as art deco nightclubs, private beaches, and incredible national parks with the help of the CSI DMC team in South Florida. All you need is your sunscreen and beach towel – leave the rest of the details to us!

title: Custom Destination Event Planning & Management - Scottsdale| CSI DMC
text:
SCOTTSDALE
Maureen Carter
Senior VP, Global Sales +1 719.491.2953 maureen.carter@csi-dmc.com
CSI DMC SCOTTSDALE
Discover Scottsdale, Arizona, where desert meets luxury. This dazzling oasis is home to over 70 renowned resorts and hotels. It’s truly a golfer’s paradise and spa-goers dream.  Embrace the local ambiance by creating a tranquil sanctuary, a luxe gala, or curating a vibrant cultural experience – it’s your choice in Scottsdale. Outdoor enthusiasts will be captivated by the scenic hiking trails and desert vistas, while golfers will flock to Scottsdale’s premiere golf courses. In the Old Town district, explore a unique blend of modernity and history that is the heart of Scottsdale. Experience the Old West, explore local museums, or sip and stroll along the Scottsdale Wine Trail. Sky Harbor International Airport and Phoenix Mesa Gateway Airport provide easy access to the city, and the free trolly system makes exploring Scottsdale effortless.

title: Custom Destination Event Planning & Management - Phoenix | CSI DMC
text:
PHOENIX
Maureen Carter
Senior VP, Global Sales +1 719.491.2953 maureen.carter@csi-dmc.com
CSI dmc PHOENIX
Explore the dazzling Valley of the Sun in Phoenix, the capital city of Arizona. Surrounded by stunning mountain vistas, Phoenix provides the perfect backdrop for extraordinary events. Whether you love historic architecture, contemporary structures, or natural landscapes, this city contains an abundance of venues to fit groups of all sizes. tastes. During the day, enjoy custom tours, explore the world’s largest municipal park, experience the local arts scene, or learn something new during a specialized program at one of Phoenix’s museums. Indulge in premier Southwestern flavors, enjoy live entertainment, or dance the night away as part of the city’s vibrant nightlife. The city’s diverse attractions and culture make it an ideal location for special events and programs of all sizes and interests. Located near the heart of the city, Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport (PHX) allows for quick and easy access to everything Phoenix offers with daily domestic and international flights.

text:
Orlando
ANNETTE HAWKS
Senior VP, Global Sales +1 407-615-1111 annette.hawks@csi-dmc.com
CSI DMC ORLANDO
The theme park capitol of the world is yours to enjoy! Known as “The City Beautiful” and home to the second largest convention facility in the United States, Orlando mixes the best of thrilling theme park attractions with business savvy event spaces. Discover the flourishing live arts and theatre scenes, eco-tourism encounters, and award-winning dining that make Orlando a vibrant and exciting option for your events. Let your imagination take hold as the CSI DMC team in Orlando makes your program dreams come true.

title: Custom Destination Event Planning & Management - Boston, MA | CSI DMC
text:
Newport, RI
Cara Pratt, CMP, DMCP
VP of Business Development +1 781-835-5640 cara.pratt@csi-dmc.com
CSI DMC Newport
A true nautical New England destination, Newport, Rhode Island is ideally situated between NYC and Boston. Savor the freshest seafood at a traditional clambake overlooking the harbor or at an upscale restaurant on a wharf; experience life in the Gilded Age when you plan an event at one of the “summer cottages” of America’s wealthiest families (the Newport Mansions) or gather at one of the city’s two Hall of Fames, tennis and sailing. Explore the scenic Cliff Walk with our local experts or experience Newport’s world-renowned harbor with a leisure excursion on a schooner or recreate an America’s Cup regatta for a teambuilding exercise. This small seaside city has something to please all groups.
Your CSI DMC Newport team looks forward to showing your guests the history and culture that makes Newport a favorite for locals and groups alike!

With stunning classical and neoclassical architecture, dozens of colleges and universities, and an expanding culinary scene, this destination beckons clients to return again and again with its unique southern charm. Partnering with CSI DMC Nashville will leave you humming a happy tune!

title: Worldwide Destination Event Company | Event Planning & Management | CSI DMC
text:
We Work Where You Do
CLIENTS FIRST. ALWAYS.
We understand you like to work with an experienced strategic partner, engaged continuously from program to program. We respect you want to work with the destination experts to create exceptional experiences.  From the smallest detail to the greater vision, CSI DMC has you covered.  With our extensive resources at your call, we offer a proactive, goal oriented, and creative approach to your destination and event management needs. Our event professionals live and work within our regional destinations, focusing on logistical management and solutions, while our creative teams drive concept development and innovative experiences your guests will love. CSI DMC is the trusted global choice clients make for authentic experiences, local destination knowledge, and event management expertise. Where may we create your next exceptional experience?

title: Destination Meeting Management | CSI DMC Event Services | CSI DMC
text:
HYBRID programS
sEAMLESS INTEGRATION
Incorporating seamless digital solutions with in-person events requires thoughtful planning and coordination. The CSI DMC team is here to ensure an exceptional experience every click of the way. Through creative ideation, strategic platform development, ensuring high-quality streaming, and ensuring interactive elements feel seamless, CSI DMC provides you with the best resources and cutting-edge selection of digital solutions that blend best with in-person programs. With 3D virtual presenters and AI generated content sets and exhibit halls, managed live polling, cohesive branding, and animated features, guests experience a cohesive program from A-Z. Add some customized team building, IRL catering enhancements, virtual entertainment, unique gifting and thoughtful community give back solutions. 
Our team collaborates with clients from all over the world to create an impact well before sessions start and will manage your hybrid events from first click to closure.
Contact Us
All Virtual Experiences Taking You Everywhere from Anywhere

title: Destination Meeting Management | CSI DMC Event Services | CSI DMC
text:
MEETING MANAGEMENT

Transportation
MOBILIZE
TRANSPORTING GUESTS CITYWIDE
With the utmost in service, we will professionally transfer guests to/from any point in the city, greet guests at the airport with a smile, and conduct departures with finesse. Want your guests picked up by the city’s favorite baseball mascot? Done. Seamless transportation experience including:
Detailed Airport Manifest Management
Quality Airport Meet and Greets for Arrivals and Departures
Citywide Conference Shuttles and Mass Moves
Novelty Transportation Experiences (Horse-Drawn Carriages, Pedi-Cabs, Etc.)
Comfortable Group Transfers

Teambuilding & CSR
COLLABORATE
BONDING WITH YOUR TEAM
Create purpose and connection among your guests with a customized team building event. Each program is designed to express client brand values so that guests are engaging with the company as well as each other. No standard trust falls here. Explore options that build camaraderie (or at least bragging rights) such as:
Sustainable Team Building Activities
Scavenger Hunts

Contact Us
GIVING BACK
ENGAGING WITH THE COMMUNITY
The CSI DMC team is passionate about our destinations, and have developed deep ties in their communities. For clients whose company culture includes a focus on corporate social responsibility, this means we can connect you with many local organizations who serve various needs in the area. We can organize volunteer sessions, give back events, and unique service opportunities that will resonate directly with your guests.

BambooHR
CSR – Corporate Social Responsibility | CSI DMC
text:
CSR – Corporate Social Responsibility
Corporate social responsibility is important CSI DMC. Our policies show that we proactively and thoroughly held ourselves to higher standards in ethical behavior, environmental sustainability, data security and more.
Our business is founded on trust and public confidence. We strive to be in strict compliance with all laws and regulations that apply to conducting our business. When any law or regulation seems unclear or ambiguous, employees are urged to consult their immediate supervisor to seek assistance in determining lawful procedures.
To this end, everything we do is driven by a strong client service methodology, inside and out. All decisions regarding company policy have this premise in mind.
Sustainability
CSI DMC recognizes that the long-term health of our business is directly connected to the health of the planet and local communities. We remain focused on sourcing environmental solutions that will lessen our footprint, while serving as an example to our peers. CSI DMC office operating at each destination identifies and works to minimize relevant environmental impacts under the applicable laws within jurisdiction.
CSI DMC proactively pursues opportunities to reuse materials from events and meetings, otherwise may be wasted. Also, at given opportunities, CSI DMC suggest ideas to donate untouched and unconsumed food and beverage items as well as florals to local food kitchens and senior housing communities.
Apart from legal obligations, our company will proactively protect the environment. Examples of relevant activities include:
Recycling
Conserving energy
Organizing reforestation excursions
Using environmentally-friendly technologies wherever possible
Data Security and Privacy
Protecting the privacy of our customers, vendors and employees is critical to our ability to maintain their trust. CSI DMC take precautions to safeguard sensitive information, to include customer data, in order to ensure a safe and secure online environment.
Anyone Processing Personal Data must comply with principles of good practice. These provide that Personal Data must be:
Processed fairly, lawfully and in a transparent manner in relation to individuals.
Collected for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes and not further processed in a manner that is incompatible with those purposes.
Adequate, relevant and limited to what is necessary in relation to the purpose for which they are processed.
Not kept longer than necessary for the purpose for which the Personal Data is processed.
Processed in line with Data Subjects’ rights.
Volunteering
CSI DMC will encourage its employees to volunteer. They can volunteer through programs organized internally or externally. Our company may sponsor volunteering events from other organizations.
Supporting the community
CSI DMC may initiate and support community investment and educational programs. For example, it may begin partnerships with vendors for renovating public buildings. It can provide support to nonprofit organizations or movements to promote cultural and economic development of global and local communities.
The CSI tDMC eam is passionate about our destinations, and have developed deep ties in their communities. We can organize volunteer sessions, give back events, and unique service opportunities that will resonate directly with our clients as a part of initiatives.

title: Best Custom, Destination Event Planning | Why Choose CSI DMC | CSI DMC
text:
Why CSI DMC
 
Our Story
For over three decades, CSI DMC has been transforming events into exceptional experiences for organizations across the globe. Founded in 1987 on Capitol Hill in Washington, DC, our team of talented professionals, including designers, destination experts, and event management specialists, are dedicated to ensuring the success of our clients.
With boundless creativity, deep destination knowledge, extensive local relationships, global resources, and proven logistical expertise, we are the award-winning, strategic partner that clients trust to deliver exceptional events in over 65 destinations every year.
 Where may we create your next exceptional experience? 
Meet The Team
THE CSI DMC DIFFERENCE
Innovation is at the core of our company. Our award-winning team offers fresh ideas and creative solutions, unmatched logistical expertise, and a deep local knowledge that is backed by national resources and leadership who support ingenuity. We strive to consistently produce extraordinary, one-of-a-kind programming, serving as a one-stop resource for our clients, providing individualized service and attention to detail. CSI DMC is dedicated to being your strategic partner and a true extension of your team, tying the goals of your program to the authenticity of the destination. No matter the size or scope of your event, we are excited to start planning!
A TRACK RECORD OF SUCCESS

CSI DMC IN THE COMMUNITY
Do good, feel good.  The CSI DMC team is passionate about engaging with our local communities. Giving back to our destinations is an integral part of our company culture. Both as individuals and together in our teams, we dedicate time and energy to the causes and organizations that are dear to our hearts.
